column1: Smoque BBQ////Good BBQ is part art and part science
column2: and with so many variables even the best are going to have an off day now and then....so I'm still giving Smoque three stars.  It's quite possible that I just hit it at an off time or a bad day
column3: and I won't give up on it yet.  Smoque has definitely earned some leeway
column4: and I hope to raise the rating to 4 or 5 stars down the road.  But another bad experience
column5: and I may be done with it.
